en: in the name of Allah [are] its course and its anchorage.
Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."

ar: وَهِىَ تَجْرِى بِهِمْ فِى مَوْجٍ كَٱلْجِبَالِ
en: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains,

ar: وَهِىَ تَجْرِى بِهِمْ فِى مَوْجٍ كَٱلْجِبَالِ
en: And it sailed with them through waves like mountains,

ar: وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٌ ٱبْنَهُۥ وَكَانَ فِى مَعْزِلٍ
en: and Noah called to his son who was apart [from them],
"O my son, come aboard with us
"O my son, come aboard with us
and be not with the disbelievers."

ar: قَالَ سَـَٔاوِىٓ إِلَىٰ جَبَلٍ يَعْصِمُنِى مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ
en: [But] he said, "I will take refuge on a mountain to protect me from the water."

en: [Noah] said, "There is no protector today from the decree of Allah,
